name: The Zulu
startIntroPart1: You are the lion of the Zulu people. The reunited peoples from divided mecriocrity.
startIntroPart2: Your mission is to lead the Zulu to rule the world!
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: You dare have the courage to challenge nod, but no fear, for I will sweep you out of history.
defeated: You have the guts to call my body a corpse but beware, I know what will happen to our future- our tiberium future.
introduction: The Zulu nation acknowledges your presence.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.

name: Great Zimbabwe
startIntroPart1: You are the Mambo, the leader beneath your ancient walls.
startIntroPart2: Lead your castle to lead the world!
declaringWar: It is sad that your actions have caused destruction.
defeated: Our golden bird will shine bright again!
introduction: The Zimbabwe Bird flies over you.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: Provides cheapest [Culture] building in your first [2] cities for free

name: The Maori
startIntroPart1: You are the supreme chief, leader of the Lost Nation
startIntroPart2: Lead your island tribes to global supremacy!
declaringWar: KA HĪ! KA HĀ! Your existence will be punished!
attacked: Our breath rises to our ancestors, your mistake is our lesson
defeated: Our culture will persist, even if you're in charge!
introduction: We welcome you to our paradise!
tradeRequest: With all the gifts of Aoteroa, we meet to discuss exchanges

name: The Amazonians
startIntroPart1: You are the chief of many peoples, the hoarder of Amazonian secrets
startIntroPart2: Lead your jungle-versed people to global fortitude!
declaringWar: The splint of our arrows, marks the X on your body.
attacked: Good luck, naive ones need it!
defeated: May my people be treated with dignity!
tradeRequest: With our hearts on our hands, we offer this to you.

name: United States
startIntroPart1: The high chief of the American people, embozoned by the White House
startIntroPart2: Lead your great nation to global Superpower!
declaringWar: You come in the way of the American people, You shall be liberated!
attacked: You come in the way of the next great Superpower, you shall feel freedom!
defeated: The American dream awakened, who are you strong power?
introduction: Good Morning, the CIA had said something about you.
tradeRequest: We have a trade to discuss.
